snippet: A French convert to Islam was convicted of using the Internet to disseminate terrorist propaganda and promote participation in terrorist acts and was sentenced by a Paris court to one year in prison and two more on probation late Tuesday.
abstract: Romain Letellier, French convert to Islam, is convicted of using the Internet to disseminate terrorist propaganda and promote participation in terrorist acts; is sentenced by a Paris court to one year in prison and two more on probation.
lead_paragraph: A French convert to Islam was convicted of using the Internet to disseminate terrorist propaganda and promote participation in terrorist acts and was sentenced by a Paris court to one year in prison and two more on probation late Tuesday.

headline.main: Jail Sentence in France Over ‘Cyber Jihad’
